Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?

I have a slowly progressive facial deformity that has been present since early childhood in the upper right quadrant of my face. It looks like a bulging mass with a "bag-of-worms" appearance and the skin over it is thicker than normal.
Do you have any similar lesions on other parts of your body or just on your face?
I don't have any similar lesions on other parts of my body, just on my face.
Has anyone in your family had similar symptoms or been diagnosed with a skin or genetic condition?
No, there is no family history of similar skin lesions or genetic conditions.
Have you experienced any changes in sensation or movement in the affected area of your face?
No, I haven't experienced any changes in sensation or movement in the affected area of my face.
Final Diagnosis: Facial Hemangioma
